Package org.bff.javampd.playlist

Interface Playlist

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MPDPlaylist
    public interface Playlist
    Author:
    bill

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addFileOrDirectory​(MPDFile file)
      Adds a directory of songs to the playlist.
      void addPlaylistChangeListener​(PlaylistChangeListener pcl)
      Adds a PlaylistChangeListener to this object to receive PlaylistChangeEvents.
      void addSong​(String file)
      Adds a MPDSong to the playlist and fires a PlaylistChangeEvent for event listeners
      void addSong​(String file, boolean fireEvent)
      Adds a MPDSong to the playlist.
      void addSong​(MPDSong song)
      Adds a MPDSong to the playlist and fires a PlaylistChangeEvent for event listeners
      void addSong​(MPDSong song, boolean fireEvent)
      Adds a MPDSong to the playlist.
      boolean addSongs​(List<MPDSong> songList)
      Adds a List of MPDSongs to the playlist.
      boolean addSongs​(List<MPDSong> songList, boolean fireEvent)
      Adds a List of MPDSongs to the playlist.
      void clearPlaylist()
      Removes all songs from the playlist.
      void deletePlaylist​(String playlistName)
      Deletes the playlist from the MPD server.
      void deletePlaylist​(MPDSavedPlaylist playlist)
      Deletes a MPDSavedPlaylist
      MPDSong getCurrentSong()
      Returns the current song.
      List<MPDSong> getSongList()
      Returns the list of songs in the playlist.
      int getVersion()
      Returns the playlist version.

      Adds a album to the playlist.
      void insertAlbum​(String artistName, String albumName)
      Adds a album by a artist to the playlist.

      Adds a MPDAlbum to the playlist.
      void insertAlbum​(MPDArtist artist, MPDAlbum album)
      Adds a MPDAlbum by a MPDArtist to the playlist.
      void insertArtist​(String artistName)
      Adds a artist to the playlist.

      Adds a MPDArtist to the playlist.

      Adds a genre to the playlist.
      void insertGenre​(MPDGenre genre)
      Adds a MPDGenre to the playlist.
      void insertYear​(String year)
      Adds a year to the playlist.
      void loadPlaylist​(String playlistName)
      Loads the songs in the given playlist to the current playlist.
      void move​(MPDSong song, int to)
      Moves the desired song to the given position in the playlist.

      Removes a album by a artist from the playlist.

      Removes a MPDAlbum by a MPDArtist from the playlist.

      Removes a artist from the playlist.

      Removes a MPDArtist from the playlist.

      Removes a genre from the playlist.

      Removes a MPDGenre from the playlist.
      void removePlaylistStatusChangedListener​(PlaylistChangeListener pcl)
      Removes a PlaylistChangeListener from this object.
      void removeSong​(int position)
      Removes a MPDSong from the playlist.
      void removeSong​(MPDSong song)
      Removes a MPDSong from the playlist.
      void removeYear​(String year)
      Removes a year from the playlist.

      Saves the current playlist as the passed playlist name.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the songs in the playlist.

      Swaps the given two songs in the playlist.
      String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this playlist.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlaylistChangeListener

        void addPlaylistChangeListener​(PlaylistChangeListener pcl)
        Adds a PlaylistChangeListener to this object to receive PlaylistChangeEvents.
        Parameters:
        pcl - the PlaylistChangeListener to add

      • removePlaylistStatusChangedListener

        void removePlaylistStatusChangedListener​(PlaylistChangeListener pcl)
        Removes a PlaylistChangeListener from this object.
        Parameters:
        pcl - the PlaylistChangeListener to remove

      • loadPlaylist

        void loadPlaylist​(String playlistName)
        Loads the songs in the given playlist to the current playlist. The playlist name can be givin with or without the .m3u extension.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - the playlist name

      • addSong

        void addSong​(MPDSong song)
        Adds a MPDSong to the playlist and fires a PlaylistChangeEvent for event listeners
        Parameters:
        song - the song to add

      • addSong

        void addSong​(String file)
        Adds a MPDSong to the playlist and fires a PlaylistChangeEvent for event listeners
        Parameters:
        file - the file to add

      • addSong

        void addSong​(String file,
             boolean fireEvent)
        Adds a MPDSong to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        file - the song to add
        fireEvent - whether to fire song added event for the event listeners

      • addSong

        void addSong​(MPDSong song,
             boolean fireEvent)
        Adds a MPDSong to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        song - the song to add
        fireEvent - whether to fire song added event for the event listeners

      • addSongs

        boolean addSongs​(List<MPDSong> songList)
        Adds a List of MPDSongs to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        songList - the list of songs to add
        Returns:
        true if the songs are added successfully; false otherwise

      • addSongs

        boolean addSongs​(List<MPDSong> songList,
                 boolean fireEvent)
        Adds a List of MPDSongs to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        songList - the list of songs to add
        fireEvent - true if a playlist event should be fired after adding
        Returns:
        true if the songs are added successfully; false otherwise

      • addFileOrDirectory

        void addFileOrDirectory​(MPDFile file)
        Adds a directory of songs to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        file - the directory to add

      • removeSong

        void removeSong​(MPDSong song)
        Removes a MPDSong from the playlist.
        Parameters:
        song - the song to remove

      • removeSong

        void removeSong​(int position)
        Removes a MPDSong from the playlist.
        Parameters:
        position - the playlist position to remove

      • getCurrentSong

        MPDSong getCurrentSong()
        Returns the current song.
        Returns:
        the current song

      • clearPlaylist

        void clearPlaylist()
        Removes all songs from the playlist.

      • deletePlaylist

        void deletePlaylist​(MPDSavedPlaylist playlist)
        Deletes a MPDSavedPlaylist
        Parameters:
        playlist - the MPDSavedPlaylist

      • deletePlaylist

        void deletePlaylist​(String playlistName)
        Deletes the playlist from the MPD server.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - the playlist to delete

      • move

        void move​(MPDSong song,
          int to)
        Moves the desired song to the given position in the playlist.
        Parameters:
        song - the song to move
        to - the position to move the song to

      • shuffle

        void shuffle()
        Shuffles the songs in the playlist.

      • swap

        void swap​(MPDSong song1,
          MPDSong song2)
        Swaps the given two songs in the playlist.
        Parameters:
        song1 - first song to swap
        song2 - second song to swap

      • savePlaylist

        boolean savePlaylist​(String playlistName)
        Saves the current playlist as the passed playlist name.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - the playlist name for the playlist
        Returns:
        true if the playlist is saved; otherwise false

      • insertAlbum

        void insertAlbum​(MPDArtist artist,
                 MPDAlbum album)
        Adds a MPDAlbum by a MPDArtist to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        artist - the MPDArtist for the album to add
        album - the MPDAlbum to add

      • insertAlbum

        void insertAlbum​(String artistName,
                 String albumName)
        Adds a album by a artist to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        artistName - the album's artist
        albumName - the album name

        Parameters:
        albumName - the album to add

      • removeAlbum

        void removeAlbum​(MPDArtist artist,
                 MPDAlbum album)
        Removes a MPDAlbum by a MPDArtist from the playlist.
        Parameters:
        artist - the MPDArtist for the album to remove
        album - the MPDAlbum to remove

                 String albumName)

        albumName - the album to remove

        Removes a year from the playlist.

        Parameters:
        artistName - the artist to remove

      • getVersion

        int getVersion()
        Returns the playlist version.
        Returns:
        the playlist version

      • getSongList

        List<MPDSong> getSongList()
        Returns the list of songs in the playlist. This does query the MPD server for the list so care should be taken not to call it excessively.
        Returns:
        the song list

      • toString

        String toString()
        Returns the string representation of this playlist.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the string representation

          int i)
